name: God's Little Pet [Demo]
description:
God's Little Pet is a cute 2D virtual-pet simulation game. With all of your cute little friends stranded on a desert island, it's your job to feed them, water them, and make sure they're nice and happy. Who said being a God was easy?

Features
  • We've got tons of cute pets (seriously, they're adorable!)
  • Feed them fish and coconuts (a healthy diet keeps them alive!)
  • You can have them drink rainwater (pets don't like salty oceans!)
  • Keep them safe while they sleep (desert islands have bed-time?)
  • By the way, your pets can die (hurry up and download the game!)

The Team

Programmer: AGuyLikeMatt

Artist: EM54

Writer: Redza
